channel.title: Canada on madewhere
channel.description: Recent content in Canada on madewhere

item.title: Nab Leather Co
item.description: Nab Leather Co is a leather goods manufacturer in Ontario, Canada. They produce belts, wallets, and other accessories.

item.title: Reigning Champ
item.description: Reigning Champ is an athletic wear designer and manufacturer, based in Vancouver, BC. All of their products are made in Canada.

item.title: Redwood Classics
item.description: Casual wear manufacturer based in Canada. A cursory glance suggests they make all of their clothing in Canada.
